reporting-org.narrative: International Network for Bamboo and Rattan

description.narrative: Providing a platform for increased dialogue between East African bamboo producers and investors and consumers from Africa, EU and China

activity-date.narrative: Wageningen University organize Bamboost Conference with INBAR Dutch-Sino East Africa Bamboo Development Program to kick-start project activities and develop a platform for collaboration.

recipient-country.narrative: Bamboost Conference organised by Wageningen with participation of stakeholders from the Netherlands, China, Ethiopia, Kenya and Uganda.
